name: Ra
title: The Sun God and Supreme Deity of Ancient Egypt

Each night, Ra battles the serpent of chaos in the underworld, ensuring the sunâ€™s rebirth at dawn. As the embodiment of creation, order, and divine power, Ra holds a central place in Egyptian cosmology, his light symbolizing the triumph of life over darkness.

name: Osiris
title: God of the Afterlife, Resurrection, and Fertility
carousel_description:
Lord of the Dead, God of Resurrection

In the shadowed halls of the underworld, Osiris reigns, his green visage glowing with the promise of renewal. Betrayed and reborn, he stands as the eternal judge, where life flows unbroken through death.

"From every ending springs a new beginning."
description: Osiris, the god of resurrection and fertility, holds a central place in Egyptian mythology as the ruler of the underworld and the judge of the dead. Betrayed by his brother Set and resurrected by his wife Isis, Osiris symbolizes the enduring cycles of life, death, and rebirth. His governance of the afterlife ensures the balance of Maâ€™at, the cosmic order, offering justice and eternal peace to the virtuous. Associated with the Nileâ€™s renewal and agricultural abundance, Osiris embodies the promise of regeneration in both life and the natural world.

quick_facts.Symbols: Crook and Flail, Green Skin, Djed Pillar, White Crown of Upper Egypt.
quick_facts.Sacred Sites: Abydos, a major cult center for Osiris worship, where annual festivals celebrated his death and resurrection.

name: Isis
title: Goddess of Magic, Motherhood, and Rebirth

Her mastery of magic is unmatched, as seen in her resurrection of Osiris and her nurturing of Horus to reclaim his fatherâ€™s throne. Known for her compassion and strength, Isis remains a beacon of hope and protection for gods and mortals alike.

name: Horus
title: God of the Sky, Kingship, and Protection
carousel_description:
The Falcon God, Avenger of Osiris

Beneath the boundless sky, Horus spreads his wings, his falcon gaze fixed on justice. A warrior born of vengeance and destiny, he stands unyielding against chaos, a symbol of kingship and balance.

"Where the falcon soars, order triumphs over chaos."

name: Anubis
title: God of the Dead, Mummification, and the Afterlife
carousel_description:

name: Set
title: God of Chaos, Desert, and Storms
carousel_description:
God of Chaos, Storms, and the Desert
